content: Hello, in the FHIR Messaging for NVSS documentation, the Coding Response is supposed to contain jurisdiction_id, death_year, and cert_no parameters. However, the files that I received contain only cert_no. This field alone is not sufficient to link the coding response to our records because certificate number is reused for different year.
@Pete Krautscheid @Cindy Bush
Those additional fields should be present in acknowledgements and coding responses.
For acknowledgements you can use the MessageHeader.response.identifier to correlate the ack to the submission message but that won't work for Coding messages since that field isn't included.
@Marc Hadley do you know when the changes for the coding messages is done? Btw attached is the coding respose for the opioid record that i downloaded from STEVE.GA19026_TRX_000050.JSON
I've checked in with @Veronique over email so that we can look into this

Thank you for the link to Canary for those of us that cannot run on our work laptops. Pete or Howard, can you tell me which links to use on the online version that gives me the type of reports you emailed me detailing errors?
Agree with Eric, Pete and Marc.. This change was added in the newest version of the FHIR specification document. Unfortunately I miss them. I will update the application accordingly.

Hi @Kellie Broxton, if you use the Connectathon FHIR Death Records (Producing) test for individual records and the Connectathon FHIR Messages (Producing) test for messages, there's a "Generate Downloadable Report" button available.

Veronique said:

Agree with Eric, Pete and Marc.. This change was added in the newest version of the FHIR specification document. Unfortunately I miss them. I will update the application accordingly.

Hi Veronique,
when you're ready, could you please resend me the TRX files of the 4 records i sent you yesterday?

@Eric Trinh (Genesis)
Eric, check in your steve2 mailbox. The TRX files are recreated.

Veronique said:

Eric Trinh (Genesis)
Eric, check in your steve2 mailbox. The TRX files are recreated.

thanks, I see 1 file for cert 53 and that works. Could you send the other 3?

@Eric Trinh (Genesis)
Eric TRX for Certno 51 and 52 have been recreated available for you to download

@Kellie Broxton
Kelly certNo 50, 51, 52 will not generate a TRX one more time because these are duplicate records and were generated previously on 9/8/2020.
Oh ok so an update is needed then?

@Kellie Broxton
because you have submitted the same information with the same certNO on 9/8/2020, NVSS treats that record as a duplicate.
@Veronique yes I understand just wondering if I am to use the TRX files you sent me via email Tuesday or or do an update submission on those records for this Connectathon?

@Kellie Broxton
Let me resubmit these TRXs for you so that they will contain the latest update. I will keep u posted.
THX

@Kellie Broxton
the TRX files are now available for download.

Veronique said:

Eric Trinh (Genesis)
Eric TRX for Certno 51 and 52 have been recreated available for you to download

Hi Veronique,
Thank you, I see them now. Do you know when you can send TRX for certno 50?

@Eric Trinh (Genesis)
TRX for CertNo 50 is now available for download
thx

Veronique said:

Eric Trinh (Genesis)
TRX for CertNo 50 is now available for download
thx

Thanks Veronique, this one works as well.

@Kellie Broxton
NCHS received the ACK msg for certNo 51
